data.text: Wungwa, a Nzambi, bu ndilembo wakikisa maniongo mama
Balembo bengula ludimi luawu banga sabala ;
Beti lozila bu badi mu bibuangu bisuama
Beti yindula mambu makambulu masonga ayi beti tuba :
Vayi Nzambi wela kuba lozila madionga mandi
Wela balula ludimi luawu veka mu diambu diawu
Bika mutu wusonga kamona khini mu Yave
